This element is used for transactions which, by nature, result in a premium/amount change, refund, etc. If sent in a new business transaction, this amount should be zero.

currentTierEntCd.description: Tier Name is the name of a rating factor (which gets equated to a percent) for a policy or vehicle. For auto policies, it is based on driving record and driving experience in order to discount good drivers or surcharge policies for risks that were previously not actively written. For property policies, it is based on various aspects of the property such as the property age, for example. The criteria to determine the appropriate tier are state and product line specific.

PartyType.description: A person or organization - such as a business, trust or governmental department - that can participate in a product supported by the Allstate business process.  This will be information for a party which is independent of any specific Allstate product or service such as would be held by the Integrated Customer Services System in a Unified Customer View. It will not include the information for a party when they act as a representative.  Except as legally required, party information - other than identifiers - is not expected to be saved within the agrmt document but rather retrieved by reference.  When referenced data does not account for all party data, a hybrid model can be used (store some in the agrmt, reference the rest).

portfolioSearchForMatchResultEntCd.description:
A code indicating the Search for Match metric value.

Possible values:
B = Not called; Channel can use this as default value (to be set by the calling application)
N = No Result Returned
S = Single Party Returned
M = Multiple Parties Returned
SO = Single Party Returned and user decided to not use the result.  The “O” is to be appended to the “S” by the calling application if the User doesn’t Select the Party returned in the response.
MO = Multiple Parties Returned and user decided to not use the result.  The “O” is to be appended to the “M” by the calling application if the User doesn’t Select any of the Parties returned in the response

portfolioSearchForMatchResultSysCd.description:
A code indicating the Search for Match metric value.

M = Multiple Parties Returned
SO = Single Party Returned and user decided to not use the result.  The “O” is to be appended to the “S” by the calling application if the User doesn’t Select the Party returned in the response.
MO = Multiple Parties Returned and user decided to not use the result.  The “O” is to be appended to the “M” by the calling application if the User doesn’t Select any of the Parties returned in the response

contractTermExpDt.description: Date on which the term of the policy is expected to end, for the term referenced in a particular policy period.

contractTermExpDtTime.description: Date on which the term of the policy is expected to end, for the term referenced in a particular policy period.

contractTermExpUTC.description: Date on which the term of the policy is expected to end, for the term referenced in a particular policy period.

contractTermMonthCnt.description: This indicates the period of the contract, using month as a unit of measurement.

householdExtractionSourceEntCd.description: Code identifies which mix of prior insurance details were declared and used to create the household view of prior insurance.

householdExtractionSourceSysCd.description: Code identifies which mix of prior insurance details were declared and used to create the household view of prior insurance.

identityTheftExpensesCoverageInd.description: Identify Theft Expenses Coverage Indicator denotes whether there is identity theft coverage on the policy.

insurerGroupName.description: Insurer Group Name is the name of the prior insurance group.

insurerNameSearchText.description: A textual field whose value is used  to facilitate faster search response time.

levelOfRepresentationInd.description: Indicates whether the party stated that they would allow being contacted by a producer regarding their quote or policy.

limit.description: The maximum dollar amount which will be paid to the insured or for the insured under a specific coverage for a policy.

lobEntCd.description: A code identifying the line of business classification. This element uses the LineOfBusiness code list.

lobSysCd.description: A code identifying the line of business classification. This element uses the LineOfBusiness code list.

lobSubEntCd.description: A code identifying the line of business subcode that further refines the line of business code. The code identifies the product classification of the policy.

lobSubSysCd.description: A code identifying the line of business subcode that further refines the line of business code. The code identifies the product classification of the policy.

mandatoryTakeOutInd.description: This indicator is used as a part of risk decision calculations in certain states.

miscellaneousControlEntCd.description: A code representing an existing condition or pertinent information about a policy

miscellaneousControlSysCd.description: A code representing an existing condition or pertinent information about a policy

naicEntCd.description: An industry code uniquely identifying an organization chartered under state or provincial laws to act as an insurer. The source of this code list is the NAIC and/or IBC.

naicSysCd.description: An industry code uniquely identifying an organization chartered under state or provincial laws to act as an insurer. The source of this code list is the NAIC and/or IBC.

nonCLUEInsurerInd.description: Denotes that no CLUE report was required to be ordered for the insured.

noNeedReasonEntCd.description: Identifies why an operator does not need prior insurance information.

noNeedReasonSysCd.description: Identifies why an operator does not need prior insurance information.

nonPreferredCarrierEntCd.description: A code that represents the classification Allstate has assigned to an insurance company based on the type of insurance that company sells.

nonPreferredCarrierSysCd.description: A code that represents the classification Allstate has assigned to an insurance company based on the type of insurance that company sells.

nonPreferredPolicyInd.description: Non Preferred Policy Indator denotes if the prior policy was non preferred.

originalPolicyInceptionDt.description: The original inception date of this specific policy.

outstandingBalanceAmt.description: The outstanding balance of a policy on the 'as of date' as indicated by the policy balance and the policy balance subtype.

policyAmt.description: Policy Amount is the total premium on the other policy.

policyAssignedRiskInd.description: Policy Assigned Risk Indicator denotes that this policy was at one time considered high risk.

policyEntCd.description: A code identifying the type of policy being defined. This element uses the OtherPolicyType code list. The values are "Other," "Prior," or "Underlying."

policySysCd.description: A code identifying the type of policy being defined. This element uses the OtherPolicyType code list. The values are "Other," "Prior," or "Underlying."

policyInsuresSamePropertyInd.description: Policy Insurers Same Property Indicator denotes that the named insured  has a current policy with the same address that was with the address on the prior policy.

policyNbr.description: The unique number assigned to the policy, or submission, being referenced. If required for self-insurance, the self-insured license or contract number.

policyOriginSystemEntCd.description: Policy Origin System Enterprise Code is the source system code of the vendor from the prior company.

policyOriginSystemSysCd.description: Policy Origin System Enterprise Code is the source system code of the vendor from the prior company.

policyRelationshipEntCd.description: A code denoting the relationship between two policies or the role a person plays on the policy.

policyRelationshipSysCd.description: A code denoting the relationship between two policies or the role a person plays on the policy.

policyRiskTypeEntCd.description: Prior Insurance Risk Type reflects Allstate's assessment of the type of risk or tier on the insured's policy at the prior insurance company.

policyRiskTypeSysCd.description: Prior Insurance Risk Type reflects Allstate's assessment of the type of risk or tier on the insured's policy at the prior insurance company.

policyStatusEntCd.description:
A code list identifying the status of the policy after the latest committed transaction.

Sample values:
-QuotedNotBound
-New Business
-Rewrite
-Renewal

policyStatusSysCd.description:
A code list identifying the status of the policy after the latest committed transaction.

Sample values:
-QuotedNotBound
-New Business
-Rewrite
-Renewal

policyStatusDt.description: Policy Status Date is the date the last change to policy status was initiated.

policyTerminatedEntCd.description: Termination Reason Description identifies the reason that a policy or item termination occurred.

policyTerminatedSysCd.description: Termination Reason Description identifies the reason that a policy or item termination occurred.

postalCode.description: Postal Code is a series of letters and/or numbers identifying the area of a country to which to deliver mail.

priorAllstateInsuranceTypeEntCd.description: Prior Allstate Insurance Type. HO - Homeowners, IH - Indemnity, IR - Indemnity Renters, LP - Landlord Pkg Policy, MH - Motorhome.

priorAllstateInsuranceTypeSysCd.description: Prior Allstate Insurance Type. HO - Homeowners, IH - Indemnity, IR - Indemnity Renters, LP - Landlord Pkg Policy, MH - Motorhome.

priorBILimitSeqNbr.description: Sequence Number is a number used to order and distinguish a single occurrence of an item from amongst many similar occurrences of items in a set of data.

priorInsuranceClassEntCd.description: A code identifying the prior insurance category within Allstate or the category of non-Allstate insurers with whom the customer had their prior policy.

priorInsuranceClassSysCd.description: A code identifying the prior insurance category within Allstate or the category of non-Allstate insurers with whom the customer had their prior policy.

priorInsuranceGroupEntCd.description: A code that identifies the prior insurance category within Allstate, or indicates the category of non-Allstate insurers with whom the customer had their prior policy.

priorInsuranceGroupSysCd.description: A code that identifies the prior insurance category within Allstate, or indicates the category of non-Allstate insurers with whom the customer had their prior policy.

priorInsuranceProofEntCd.description: A code representing how a person proved they had prior insurance, typically by providing a copy of the policy declaration statement.

priorInsuranceProofSysCd.description: A code representing how a person proved they had prior insurance, typically by providing a copy of the policy declaration statement.

priorInsuranceProofInd.description: Prior Insurance No Need Indicator denotes that the named insured is required to show proof before they can purchase new insurance with a new company.

priorInsuranceTypeEntCd.description: A code that describes the line of the prior insurance. Values are A - Auto or M - Motorcycle.

priorInsuranceTypeSysCd.description: A code that describes the line of the prior insurance. Values are A - Auto or M - Motorcycle.

priorPolicyResidenceTypeEntCd.description: Residence Type is a description of a dwelling based on the number of families living in the residence, the number of residential units in a structure and the type of ownership held by the residents.

priorPolicyResidenceTypeSysCd.description: Residence Type is a description of a dwelling based on the number of families living in the residence, the number of residential units in a structure and the type of ownership held by the residents.

qualifiedMultiPolicyInd.description: Qualified Multi Policy Indicator denotes that a named insured had multiple prior insurance policies.

regionalOfficeEntCd.description: A code for the name of an Allstate office which supports operations for a geographic area.

regionalOfficeSysCd.description: A code for the name of an Allstate office which supports operations for a geographic area.

riskTierEntCd.description: Tier Name is the name of a rating factor (which gets equated to a percent) for a policy or vehicle. For auto policies, it is based on driving record and driving experience in order to discount good drivers or surcharge policies for risks that were previously not actively written. For property policies, it is based on various aspects of the property such as the property age, for example. The criteria to determine the appropriate tier are state and product line specific.

riskTierSysCd.description: Tier Name is the name of a rating factor (which gets equated to a percent) for a policy or vehicle. For auto policies, it is based on driving record and driving experience in order to discount good drivers or surcharge policies for risks that were previously not actively written. For property policies, it is based on various aspects of the property such as the property age, for example. The criteria to determine the appropriate tier are state and product line specific.

sourceEntCd.description: A code representing the source for information the explicit meaning of which is implied by its usage.

sourceSysCd.description: A code representing the source for information the explicit meaning of which is implied by its usage.

stateProvEntCd.description: A code identifying the state, province or national subdivision. The specific code values depend upon the national jurisdiction.

stateProvSysCd.description: A code identifying the state, province or national subdivision. The specific code values depend upon the national jurisdiction.

statisticalStateEntCd.description: A code used for accounting statistical gathering purposes. Typically it is a geographic subdivision of a state to which a policy is assigned.

statisticalStateSysCd.description: A code used for accounting statistical gathering purposes. Typically it is a geographic subdivision of a state to which a policy is assigned.

trailingDocumentDispositionEntCd.description: A code representing whether or not a document has been received by Allstate, and whether or not the form was completed by the customer.

trailingDocumentDispositionSysCd.description: A code representing whether or not a document has been received by Allstate, and whether or not the form was completed by the customer.

lengthFtCnt.description: Length specifies the measured length of an object.

lengthMeterCnt.description: Length specifies the measured length of an object.

ownershipEntCd.description: A code list indicating the ownership status of the insured/applicant.  Values are Owned, Leased, Corporate.

ownershipSysCd.description: A code list indicating the ownership status of the insured/applicant.  Values are Owned, Leased, Corporate.

vehicleTypeEntCd.description: A code identifying the predominant type of the vehicle. Sample values are SUV, Motorcycle, Private Passenger, Truck, etc.

vehicleTypeSysCd.description: A code identifying the predominant type of the vehicle. Sample values are SUV, Motorcycle, Private Passenger, Truck, etc.

endorsementDt.description: The date on which an endorsement or change to a policy was requested. An endorsement is a modifying provision added to an existing policy. A change could include spelling mistakes and address changes.

netChangeAmt.description: Contains the change amount this transaction has caused to the total amount, as it existed prior to this transaction. This element is used for transactions which, by nature, result in a premium/amount change, refund, etc. If sent in a new business transaction, this amount should be zero.

qualifierDesc.description: Additional description regarding the discount or surcharge qualifer. Sample value would be "2 incidents."

qualifierName.description: Textual representation of the name of the discount or surcharge qualifier. Sample value would be "Chargeable Accident."

renewalEntCd.description: Contains the number of policy life cycle time periods a discount or surcharges will apply.

renewalSysCd.description: Contains the number of policy life cycle time periods a discount or surcharges will apply.

surchargeAmt.description: Currency value of current term surcharge amount.

surchargeEntCd.description: A code identifying the type of discount that applies. This element uses the Credits And Surcharges sublists within the Coverages code list for a particular line of business.

surchargeSysCd.description: A code identifying the type of discount that applies. This element uses the Credits And Surcharges sublists within the Coverages code list for a particular line of business.

surchargeTypeDesc.description: Discount Surcharge Type Description provides a depiction of the discount or surcharge being applied to the policy.

writtenAmt.description: The current term amount from the first transaction in the current policy term plus/minus the net change amounts from all subsequent transactions within the same policy term.

completionOrGraduationDt.description: Specific date that driver training was successfully completed.

stateProvEntCd.description: A code identifying the state, province or national subdivision. The specific code values depend upon the national jurisdiction.

stateProvSysCd.description: A code identifying the state, province or national subdivision. The specific code values depend upon the national jurisdiction.

trainingCourseDesc.description: Samples are defensive driver, safe driver, safety course

RangeType.description: Represents the low and high values in which falls the percent of time an operator uses a vehicle.

highNbr.description: The ending number for this specific range.

lowNbr.description: The starting number for this specific range.

carpoolKilometerCnt.description: Total number of kilometers driven in a vehicle that is used for carpooling.

carpoolMileCnt.description: Total number of miles driven in a vehicle that is used for carpooling.

driverDesignationDesc.description: Classifies an operator's association with a vehicle in the context of a policy

driverTypeEntCd.description: A code list to represent that a specific driver is intentionally being excluded from coverage or is an unlicensed operator.

driverTypeSysCd.description: A code list to represent that a specific driver is intentionally being excluded from coverage or is an unlicensed operator.

driverUseEntCd.description: A code indicating the use of a given vehicle by a given driver. This element uses the DriverUse code list.

driverUseSysCd.description: A code indicating the use of a given vehicle by a given driver. This element uses the DriverUse code list.

ownedVehicleInd.description: Indicates if 'this' driver is also the owner of the vehicle.

physicalDamageExclusionInd.description: Indicator denotes that the driver is not covered for any physical damage coverage on the policy.

secondaryDriverClassFactorInd.description: Indicates whether two driver classification factors are applied for the specified vehicle during the rating process. A factor is a decimal value which is multiplied against a base rate during rating to calculate premium. This factor is based upon a driver's marital status, gender, age, vehicle usage and mileage. In some cases where multiple dissimilar drivers use the same vehicle, the second person's factor is used in addition to the first person's factor.

usePct.description: The percentage of total vehicle usage accounted for by driver.

vehicle_RefId.description: Vehicle, aka Motorized Land Vehicle, is a self-propelled vehicle that can be used for transportation or recreation on land.  This ranges from motorcycles, cars, pickup trucks and semi-trucks; to motorhomes, all-terrain and recreational vehicles (ATVs/RVs), golf carts and even snow mobiles.

youngRatedDriverInd.description: Indicates that a person is a young driver and that they are the rated operator for the specified vehicle.

autoLISReport_RefId.description: A third party report that generally contains up to seven years of personal auto claims history.

mvrReport_RefId.description: A report from the state containing basic license information about an operator, along with accidents and violations associated with that operator.

recordDropDt.description: The date that gets updated when a new version of a segment is created.  The old segment will contain an updated DROPDT.  A new version of a segment is created after an endorsement or a renewal and data has been modified.

sourceEntCd.description: A code representing the source for information the explicit meaning of which is implied by its usage.

sourceSysCd.description: A code representing the source for information the explicit meaning of which is implied by its usage.

undeclaredEntCd.description: Undeclared Accident Violation Description is the source from which notification was received of the accident or violation occurrence.

undeclaredSysCd.description: Undeclared Accident Violation Description is the source from which notification was received of the accident or violation occurrence.

undeclaredInd.description: Indicator denotes the source from which notification was received of the accident or violation occurrence.

Sample values are Obtained from CLUE Program, Obtained from LIS, Obtained from MVR, Renewal Activity from Data Warehouse, etc.

undeclaredViolationSourceSysCd.description: A code representing the manner by which an undeclared violation was received or uncovered. Uses Undeclared Accident Violation Description domain. Sample values are Obtained from CLUE Program, Obtained from LIS, Obtained from MVR, Renewal Activity from Data Warehouse, etc.

violationDesc.description: Describes the type of incident that took place. An incident is an occurrence that may have an effect on the rating of a policy. This could include prior accidents or violations.

violationDt.description: Tthe date the violation was issued.

violationOriginationRecordTypeSysCd.description: CMS Domain - Accident Violation Description. Values are 38 - SERIOUS VIOLATION, 99 - Unmatched Violation, 98 - Unmatched Accident, 25 - Accident At Fault

violationRecordTypeSysCd.description: CMS Domain - Accident Violation Record Type. Values are At Fault, Not At FAult, Violation Abbr, Minor Violation, Major Violation, Serious Violation.

violationSubSysCd.description: Defines the accident violation in more detail. CMS Domain - Accident Violation Subtype. Sample values are Total Fire, Total Theft.

aboutMeSurveyInd.description: Indicates that the customer filled out a "getting to know you" survey and is eligible to receive the About Me Discount.

accident.description: An aggregate containing information related to the accidents that were reported on a Motor Vehicle Report but extracted and condensed based on business rules.

accidentSurchargePointCnt.description: Indicates the total number of points assigned for all the operators within a policy. Accident Surcharge Points are assigned for each operator based upon the years since an operator's most recent accident as well as the yea

accidentSurchargePointPreSRMCnt.description: Indicates the total number of points assigned for all the operators within a policy. Accident Surcharge Points are assigned for each operator based upon the years since an operator's most recent accident as well as the yea

accountNbr.description: The number assigned to the account by the controlling party to uniquely identify that account within its business context.

additionalInterestRequirementEntCd.description: A code representing requirements of an additional interest or third parties. Sample values are Copies of Documents Related to Insured Propperty, Copy of Proof of Coverage, Notice from Allstate after Premium Paid in Full, Copy of Policy JAcket, Notification that Policy has been Reinstated After Lapse, etc.

additionalInterestRequirementSysCd.description: A code representing requirements of an additional interest or third parties. Sample values are Copies of Documents Related to Insured Propperty, Copy of Proof of Coverage, Notice from Allstate after Premium Paid in Full, Copy of Policy JAcket, Notification that Policy has been Reinstated After Lapse, etc.

adverseAction.description: Adverse Action is a negative measure imposed on a policy such as the removal of a discount, the addition of a surcharge, or the termination of a policy, etc.

ageReclassificationInd.description: Indicates whether a person has been rerated because their age has been reclassified. Some states require that operators under a certain age must be reclassified every year on their birth date, unless there was an endorsement prior to their birth date which caused a rerate to occur.

allstateAtWorkInd.description: This is Allstate at Work where Allstate has (or will be) working with other companies to promote the selling of auto business to their employees and offer payroll deduction of the premiums. AlphaStaff is the second company to sign up and they actually process payrolls for numerous other companies.The company names will be displayed in the IMPACT application under the Business description.

applicantExistingCustomerInd.description: Indicates that the applicant is an existing customer.

applicantTypeEntCd.description: A code indicating if the applicant is a current customer or a prospect.

applicantTypeSysCd.description: A code indicating if the applicant is a current customer or a prospect.

billingRecordSortOrderEntCd.description: A code that describes the order in which list billing records should be sorted, typically used when multiple customers are combined into one escrow check from a third party. Sample values are 0-Not Applicable, 1-Loan Number Order, 2-Loan Number Within Expiration Date, 3-Insured's Surname Order.

billingRecordSortOrderSysCd.description: A code that describes the order in which list billing records should be sorted, typically used when multiple customers are combined into one escrow check from a third party. Sample values are 0-Not Applicable, 1-Loan Number Order, 2-Loan Number Within Expiration Date, 3-Insured's Surname Order.

birthDtGeneratedInd.description: When an age was calcualed using the birth date.

cfrFiling.description: Certificate of Financial Responsibility Filing proves that the insured and/or other relevant parties are insured by an Allstate company and are, therefore, financially responsible. A Certificate of Financial Responsibility is usually required by a state to reinstate a revoked driver's license.

chargeableStatusEntCd.description: Values are R - Charge After Renewal, S -  Charge At Subsequent Renewal, Y - Charge At Initial Rating.

chargeableStatusSysCd.description: Values are R - Charge After Renewal, S -  Charge At Subsequent Renewal, Y - Charge At Initial Rating.

cleanDriverClassificationEntCd.description: A code that classifies the rated driver whose driving record is absent of accidents and violations. Values include Adult, Basic, and Restricted.

cleanDriverClassificationSysCd.description: A code that classifies the rated driver whose driving record is absent of accidents and violations. Values include Adult, Basic, and Restricted.

coveredPersonDesignationInd.description: Designation Of Covered Person Or Organization

creditScore.description: Note: During Policy SWAT it was discussed that IFS (financial stability) is no longer the appropriate term. The term to use is Insurance Score

deniedPremierPlusInd.description: Indicates the denial of a Premier Plus discount on the insured item.

discount.description: Discount Information is a collection of data describing the discount.

distanceToWorkOrSchoolKilometerCnt.description: Kilometers To Work Number is the number of Kilometers traveled to work or school in one direction.

distanceToWorkOrSchoolMileCnt.description: As used here, this is the number of miles traveled to work or school in one direction.

distantStudentInd.description: Indicator confirms insured party, a student is away at college with no access to a car except over vacations, breaks and summer.

domesticEmployeeInd.description: Domestic Employee Indicator denotes that domestic workers are employed on the property.

droppedDt.description: Dropped Date is when a party was dropped from the policy.

effDtTime.description: An effective date and time, the explicit meaning of which is implied by its parent or its usage.

effUTC.description: Contains the UTC date and time format, the explicit meaning of which is implied by its parent or its usage.

endorsementDt.description: The date on which an endorsement or change to a policy was requested. An endorsement is a modifying provision added to an existing policy. A change could include spelling mistakes and address changes.

excludedDriverReasonEntCd.description: A code describing why a driver is not covered by an insurance policy. Sample values are  License Suspended, Limited Driver, Loss History, Not In Household, Drives Company Vehicle, etc.

excludedDriverReasonSysCd.description: A code describing why a driver is not covered by an insurance policy. Sample values are  License Suspended, Limited Driver, Loss History, Not In Household, Drives Company Vehicle, etc.

fiveYearsContSameCarrierInd.description: Denotes that an insured has had coverage with the same insurance company without lapsing for 5 consecutive years.

fiveYearsPrefPriorInsProofInd.description: Denotes that an insured has had insurance with another company for 5 prior years.

governmentWorkVehicleUseInd.description: Indicator denotes that a customer used a government owned vehicle for work.

householdResidentInd.description: Indicator denotes that a person is a member of the household with the named insured.

insuranceRequiredByLawInd.description: Denotes that a customer who drives an automobile, motorcycle or vehicle that can be driven on a roadway, purchase the required state mandaed insurance by law.

insuredOrPrincipalRoleEntCd.description: If record from RAP05, this will be "Insured." If record from RAP07, "Spouse." Should this just be in CIM under participantRoleCd?

insuredOrPrincipalRoleSysCd.description: If record from RAP05, this will be "Insured." If record from RAP07, "Spouse." Should this just be in CIM under participantRoleCd?

interestEndDt.description: The date the interest holder's interest terminates.

interestIdNbr.description: The identifying number for the Additional/Other Interest Group for which a premium is being charged.

lenTimeBoatExperienceYearCnt.description: The number of years the operator has while owning a boat.

lenTimeContinuousStdInsuranceMonthCnt.description: The number of consecutive months a customer has had standard insurance with a company.

lenTimeLapseBetweenPoliciesDayCnt.description: The number of days coverage has lapsed between the time a customer has cancelled one policy and purchased another.

lenTimeNonJUAContinuousInsuranceMonthCnt.description: The number of continuous months that a party has prior insurance coverage that is not Joint Underwriting Assoc/Assigned Risk (JUA/AR), prior to Allstate.

lenTimePrevInsurerYearCnt.description: The number of years a customer has had previous insurance with another insurance company.

lenTimeRidingYearCnt.description: Number of years experience operator has of riding a motorcycle.

lenTimeSinceOperatedVehicleMonthCnt.description: The number of months an operator last drove a vehicle.

lenTimeTotalContInsuranceMonthCnt.description: The number of continous months a customer has had insurance with a company.

lossPayeeInd.description: Indicates that a third party plays both the roles of loss payee (they have a fiduciary interest in the policy due to money being loaned for the asset) and interested party (they are interested in the liability coverages on the policy to protect themselves from being sued, as in the garage owner who stores someone else's vehicle).

militaryDiscountInd.description: Applies to a rated operator who had been in active service in one of the armed forces.

mvrOrderConsentInd.description: Indicates that the driver has given his or her consent for Allstate to order a motor vehicle report.

mvrWaivedReasonEntCd.description: The various reasons why an MVR may be waived.

mvrWaivedReasonSysCd.description: The various reasons why an MVR may be waived.

newlyIndependentDiscountInd.description: Newly Independent Discount Indicator denotes if the participant is newly independent.

nonDriverReasonEntCd.description: A code describing the reason a spouse has not been rated on a policy.  Sample values in Alliance are Never Drive, Has Own Car, Medical, Disabled, Age, Learner, Other. Uses Unrated Spose Reason Description domain.

nonDriverReasonSysCd.description: A code describing the reason a spouse has not been rated on a policy.  Sample values in Alliance are Never Drive, Has Own Car, Medical, Disabled, Age, Learner, Other. Uses Unrated Spose Reason Description domain.

noNeedPriorInsuranceInd.description: Denotes if an operator does not need proof of prior insurance. This occurs when an operator was previously in a situation where no auto insurance was required, as in newly licensed, out of the country, did not own an automobile, etc

nonOwnedVehicleOperatorInd.description: Denotes whether the coverage on a vehicle is not owned by the named insured or a resident relative.

noPriorInsuranceReasonEntCd.description: No Need Reason Prior Insurance Description identifies why an operator does not need prior insurance information.

noPriorInsuranceReasonSysCd.description: No Need Reason Prior Insurance Description identifies why an operator does not need prior insurance information.

oldestContinuousPriorEffDt.description: Indicates that of the multiple prior insurance policies the customer had, which one had the longest active effective date.

onPrevPolicyInd.description: Denotes the driver was assigned to a vehicle on the prior policy.

operationsDesc.description: A text description of the operations of this risk or insured

organizationMembershipEntCd.description: A code that identifies officially recognized organizations for which a discount is received if a customer belongs to it. Samples are motorcycle  riding clubs, Boat Owners Association of the US, International Game Fish Association, US Coast Guard Auxilliary, etc.

organizationMembershipSysCd.description: A code that identifies officially recognized organizations for which a discount is received if a customer belongs to it. Samples are motorcycle  riding clubs, Boat Owners Association of the US, International Game Fish Association, US Coast Guard Auxilliary, etc.

originalAddDt.description: Date when the operator was initially added to the policy.

outstandingBalanceAmt.description: The outstanding balance of a policy on the 'as of date' as indicated by the policy balance and the policy balance subtype.

over2YearsAtAddressInd.description: Denotes that the insured has lived at the propert for at least 2 years.

ownLiabilityInsuranceInd.description: This indicator is used to denote that the occupant (non-driver) has its own insurance and hence isn’t part of the current insurance policy.

participantTypeEntCd.description: Participant Type is a classification of a person's or institution's involvement with a policy, claim, or quote. Values are Insured, Occupant, Driver.

participantTypeSysCd.description: Participant Type is a classification of a person's or institution's involvement with a policy, claim, or quote. Values are Insured, Occupant, Driver.

physicalDamageExclusionInd.description: Indicator denotes that the driver is not covered for any physical damage coverage on the policy.

prior3YearsInsuranceProofInd.description: Prior Three Years Insurance Proof Indicator denotes that a named insured and/or spouse has had prior insurance for the past 3 years.

prior3YearsPrefInsuranceProofInd.description: Prior Three Years Preferred Insurance Proof Indicator denotes that a named insured and/or spouse has had prior preferred insurance for the past 3 years.

prior3YearsValidLicenseInd.description: Prior Three Years Valid License Indicator denotes that a named insured and/or spouse has had a valid license for the past 3 years.

priorInsuranceOverrideInd.description: Prior Insurance Override Indicator denotes that the named insured was not required to obtain prior insurance.

priorInsuranceProofInd.description: Prior Insurance No Need Indicator denotes that the named insured is required to show proof before they can purchase new insurance with a new company.

priorPolicy.description: elements under OtherOrPriorPolicy mapped at role level

priorRVExperience.description: Prior RV Experience denotes the number of years the operator has driven an RV.

recoupmentPointsInd.description: Indicates if the recoupment point value is assigned to a vehicle based upon the ability to charge for insolvencies or assigned risk rate inadequacy

removalReasonEntCd.description: Removal Reason Code is the reason a property has been removed from a consumer report.

removalReasonSysCd.description: Removal Reason Code is the reason a property has been removed from a consumer report.

safeDriverClassEntCd.description: Driver Class defines the type of driver associated with the insured vehicle based on risk categories

safeDriverClassSysCd.description: Driver Class defines the type of driver associated with the insured vehicle based on risk categories
