bindProducerIPAddress.description: Producer IP Address is a unique string of numbers separated by periods that identifies each computer using the Internet Protocol to communicate over a network.

boundAccountingCompanyEntCd.description: A code that identifies an entity for which Allstate is required to submit separate financial and/or statutory records. This could be an Allstate company or an authority outside of the Allstate Corporation.

boundAccountingCompanySysCd.description: A code that identifies an entity for which Allstate is required to submit separate financial and/or statutory records. This could be an Allstate company or an authority outside of the Allstate Corporation.

boundCancelledFlatInd.description: Indicates whether a policy was cancelled as of the issued date, thereby no coverage was provided and all money will be returned.

boundEffDt.description: The date that the coverage was bound.

boundEffDtTime.description: The date and time at which all parties signed or agreed to the requested insurance

boundEffUTC.description: The date and time at which all parties signed or agreed to the requested insurance

boundLOBEntCd.description: The type or grouping of insurance products that provide coverages, benefits or services. Examples are: 10 = Auto - Private Passenger Voluntary, 27 = Long Term Care, 70 = Homeowners, etc.

boundLOBSysCd.description: The type or grouping of insurance products that provide coverages, benefits or services. Examples are: 10 = Auto - Private Passenger Voluntary, 27 = Long Term Care, 70 = Homeowners, etc.

boundPolicyTypeEntCd.description: Policy Type defines if a commercial policy is a package policy (CPP) or a Monoline policy (MN).

boundPolicyTypeSysCd.description: Policy Type defines if a commercial policy is a package policy (CPP) or a Monoline policy (MN).

cancelDeclineDt.description: A date on which previous coverage was cancelled or declined.

cancellationAttemptCnt.description: The number of times a policy was in 'cancel' status.

cancellationEffDt.description: The date a policy was cancelled.

carryDt.description: Was used with Alert to identify the last date which the policy was paid for.  NOVA owned policies now use the RAP01.CANDT.

cedeEntCd.description: Indicates the cession status of the policy.

cedeSysCd.description: Indicates the cession status of the policy.

cedeDt.description: The date on which a policy was ceded or had its risk transferred to a reinsurance company.

cedeScoreNbr.description: A calculated score to determine if a policy should be ceded.

chargeablePeriodMonthCnt.description: The experience period, expressed in number of months, during which an accident or violation is chargeable.

christianScienceCareOptionInd.description: Christian Science Care Option Inidcator denotes that various U.S. federal, state, and private health insurance plans provide for the reimbursement of Christian Science nursing care and practitioner treatment.

cicBindScriptInd.description: CIC Bind Script Indicator denotes that the CIC followed a predefined script when binding a policy for a customer.

claim.description: Claim is a request to an insurance company for payment based on a loss in accordance with the terms of the policy.

claimRiskPlanDiscountEntCd.description:
A code describing the policy's eligibility status for a discount. 

Sample values:
A-Policy Qualifies For Discount
B-Policy Does Not Qualify For Discount And Is Locked Out
C-Policy Does Not Qualify For Discount, Re-Evaluate At Next Renewal

claimRiskPlanDiscountSysCd.description:
A code describing the policy's eligibility status for a discount. 

Sample values:
A-Policy Qualifies For Discount
B-Policy Does Not Qualify For Discount And Is Locked Out
C-Policy Does Not Qualify For Discount, Re-Evaluate At Next Renewal

claimSatisfactionGuaranteeDt.description: The date of a program in place where if you are dissatisfied with your claim in any way and file the appropriate report, we will credit you for the premium for that policy period on your next policy period.

classificationEntCd.description: A numeric classification of vehicles based on vehicle type.  Private passenger types have a four digit code and trucks and trailers have a 5 digit classification code.  For trucks the classification code is based on vehicle Gross Vehicle Weight, usage, radius of operation, and nature of business.

classificationSysCd.description: A numeric classification of vehicles based on vehicle type.  Private passenger types have a four digit code and trucks and trailers have a 5 digit classification code.  For trucks the classification code is based on vehicle Gross Vehicle Weight, usage, radius of operation, and nature of business.

collisionComprehensiveCoverageAddDt.description: This is the date Comprehensive Coverage and Collision Coverage was added to an item or policy.

commercialExposureOrRiskVehicleInd.description: Indicates whether a dwelling is located within 40 feet of any property which is not exclusively used for residential purposes. Examples include a condominium located over a restaurant or next to a church, school, store, factory, etc

communityServiceInd.description: A statement of the service that was provided by a party to a community

companyCarInHouseholdInd.description: Indicates that one or more vehicles in the possession of an applicant is a company car.

compareRatesSuccessfulInd.description: Comparison Indicator denotes a successful rate amount comparison.

comprehensiveClaimLast3YearsCnt.description: 3 Years Prior Comprehensive Claim Count is the number of comprehensive claims an insured has had in the last 3 years prior to coming to Allstate.

comprehensiveClaimLast5YearsCnt.description: 5 Years Prior Comprehensive Claim Count is the number of comprehensive claims an insured has had in the last 5 years prior to coming to Allstate.

condoAssocMembershipInd.description: Indicates that membership in a condominium association has been verified.

consentToRateEntCd.description: A code representing a feature of North Carolina law/regulation that allows an insurer to charge more than the bureau rate given the insurer gets the signed consent of the insured on a Consent To Rate form.

consentToRateSysCd.description: A code representing a feature of North Carolina law/regulation that allows an insurer to charge more than the bureau rate given the insurer gets the signed consent of the insured on a Consent To Rate form.

consumerYourChoicePkgEntCd.description: A collection of trade-offs and features that suit the customer's needs for price, brand, and coverage.

consumerYourChoicePkgSysCd.description: A collection of trade-offs and features that suit the customer's needs for price, brand, and coverage.

consumerYourChoicePkgSeqEntCd.description: Policy Option Package Type is a collection of trade-offs and features that suit the customer's needs for price, brand, and coverage.

consumerYourChoicePkgSeqSysCd.description: Policy Option Package Type is a collection of trade-offs and features that suit the customer's needs for price, brand, and coverage.

continuousInd.description: Indicator denotes whether a party, person or organization has had continuous coverage.

continuousPriorStdInsurance12MonthsInd.description: Indicates that an insured had 12 or more months of continuous prior insurance on a previous insurance policy.

continuousPriorStdInsuranceInd.description: Indicates whether a person has had continuous coverage with the same prior insurance carrier, regardless of type (preferred or standard).

contractTermContInd.description: An indicator to show whether the duration is continuous or non-continuous.

contractTermDayCnt.description: This indicates the period of the contract, using days as a unit of measurement.

contractTermDesc.description: Period of time during which a contract is active and in effect.

contractTermEffDt.description: Date that the contract between the policyholder and the company begins.

contractTermEffDtTime.description: Date the contract between the policyholder and the company begins.

contractTermEffUTC.description: Date that the contract between the policyholder and the company begins.

contractTermExpDt.description: Date on which the term of the policy is expected to end, for the term referenced in a particular policy period.

contractTermExpDtTime.description: Date on which the term of the policy is expected to end, for the term referenced in a particular policy period.

contractTermExpUTC.description: Date on which the term of the policy is expected to end, for the term referenced in a particular policy period.

contractTermMonthCnt.description: This indicates the period of the contract, using month as a unit of measurement.

coverageLapseInd.description: Insurance Coverage Lapsed Indicates that coverage had lapsed.

coverageOverrideInd.description: Indicator denotes that a coverage has been overriden.

creditAppealInsertEntCd.description: A code that describes whether the insurance score on a policy is greater than or less than the neutral insurance score. Values are Not Eligible, Underwriting Only, Worse Than Neutral.

creditAppealInsertSysCd.description: A code that describes whether the insurance score on a policy is greater than or less than the neutral insurance score. Values are Not Eligible, Underwriting Only, Worse Than Neutral.

creditAppealStatusEntCd.description: A code identifying the status of the appeal. The appeals process is initiated when a credit score is ordered and the result is lower than the "neutral score".

creditAppealStatusSysCd.description: A code identifying the status of the appeal. The appeals process is initiated when a credit score is ordered and the result is lower than the "neutral score".

creditBalanceReimburseOptionEntCd.description: Describes the manner by which a customer would like to receive a reimbursement.

creditBalanceReimburseOptionSysCd.description: Describes the manner by which a customer would like to receive a reimbursement.

creditOverrideInd.description: Override Credit  indicates an account has had a sum of money credited.

creditScore.description: Note: During Policy SWAT it was discussed that IFS (financial stability) is no longer the appropriate term. The term to use is Insurance Score

currentLapseDt.description: The current lapse reinstatement date or future last rated lapse date that occurred during this current policy term from billing. At renewal issuance this date will be moved to the last rated lapse date for tiering and rating.

customerManagedSuspenseInd.description: Customer Managed Suspension Indicator reflects the current existence of a miscellaneous flag E1. Only applies to Auto.

declaration.description: An aggregate that holds policy declarations, questions from the agent and responses of the insured.

deductibleRewardHistory.description: An aggregate containing details of a customer's deductible reward program.

deniedPremierPlusInd.description: Indicates the denial of a Premier Plus discount on the insured item.

discount.description: Discount Information is a collection of data describing the discount.

discountLevelEntCd.description: A code defining a complex set of rules for discounting based on various policy characteristics including Allstate insurance experience, prior insurance, accidents and violations.

discountLevelSysCd.description: A code defining a complex set of rules for discounting based on various policy characteristics including Allstate insurance experience, prior insurance, accidents and violations.

eBillEligibilityInd.description: Electronic Bill (EBill) Eligibility is the eligibility of a Policy to be on Allstate eBill which is la paperless program that allows customers to receive their bill notice via email instead of receiving a physical piece of mail.

enrolledInOnlineFulfillmentInd.description: Enrolled In Online Fulfillment Indicator denotes whether an insured is enrolled in the Online Fulfillment program, where electronic documents are available online.

ePolicyEnrollmentDt.description: The date on which the customer is enrolled in the Allstate ePolicy program.

ePolicyEnrollmentStatusEntCd.description: A code used to track the enrollment of the ePolicy program.

ePolicyEnrollmentStatusSysCd.description: A code used to track the enrollment of the ePolicy program.

esuranceDeviationFactor.description:
It's a decimal number calculated by rating engine. E.g. 1.55345057432334. It's specific to North carolina policies.
This factor is calculated and used to develop the premium for the ESU Rate Level.

exceedMaxBIOnDt.description: The date when the policy changed to bodily injury limit greater than high state selected limit. This is used to determine if the policy has maintained the limit for 5 years and is a tier level determinant and hence a premium determinant.

exceedMidTermBIOnDt.description: Maximum Bodily Injury Limit Effective Date is the date when the policy changed to bodily injury limit greater than high state selected limit.

exceedMinBIOnDt.description: The date when policy changed to a bodily injury limit equal to or greater than state selected limit. This is used to determine if the policy has maintained at least the state limit for 3/5 years and is a tier level determinant and hence a premium determinant.

exceptionPeriodDayCnt.description: The lenth of the window, usually expressed in number of days, prior to the experience period when the accident is considered chargeable (for example, 5 years + 45 days for forgiveness or 45 days to count the accident).

expandedMarketTierEntCd.description: Tier Name is the name of a rating factor (which gets equated to a percent) for a policy or vehicle. For auto policies, it is based on driving record and driving experience in order to discount good drivers or surcharge policies for risks that were previously not actively written. For property policies, it is based on various aspects of the property such as the property age, for example. The criteria to determine the appropriate tier are state and product line specific.

expandedMarketTierSysCd.description: Tier Name is the name of a rating factor (which gets equated to a percent) for a policy or vehicle. For auto policies, it is based on driving record and driving experience in order to discount good drivers or surcharge policies for risks that were previously not actively written. For property policies, it is based on various aspects of the property such as the property age, for example. The criteria to determine the appropriate tier are state and product line specific.

fcraNeedEntCd.description: FCRA Needed is when the FCRA notice is required to complete a policy.

fcraNeedSysCd.description: FCRA Needed is when the FCRA notice is required to complete a policy.

fcraPriorLOBEntCd.description: Prior Insurance FCRA (Fair Credit Reporting Act) Result Type classifies the results being sent to a customer explaining a rate change due to a risk assessment.

fcraPriorLOBSysCd.description: Prior Insurance FCRA (Fair Credit Reporting Act) Result Type classifies the results being sent to a customer explaining a rate change due to a risk assessment.

fcraSelectionEntCd.description: Fair Credit Reporting Act (FCRA) Selection Type is the determination from underwriting result to complete a transaction.

fcraSelectionSysCd.description: Fair Credit Reporting Act (FCRA) Selection Type is the determination from underwriting result to complete a transaction.

fcraSourceEntCd.description: fcraSource codes are values representing MVR and credit reports ordering during the quoting process. For example, Z represents MVR and Credit Report is Ordered.

fcraSourceSysCd.description: fcraSource codes are values representing MVR and credit reports ordering during the quoting process. For example, Z represents MVR and Credit Report is Ordered.

firstCancelDt.description: First Cancellation Date is the date a policy was first cancelled.

flexGroupEntCd.description: Determined based on characteristics of the Allstate House and Home policy excluding Zip code (CDB definition)

flexGroupSysCd.description: Determined based on characteristics of the Allstate House and Home policy excluding Zip code (CDB definition)

followUp.description: Follow Up Information is a collection of data detailing policy follow up.

formCode.description: Describes the form and associating form number. These are forms which are associated with policies processed by ALERT.

fraudInd.description: Indicates whether or not fraud has occurred.

fraudScore.description: Fraud Score Information contains detils about a Fraud Score.

frontEndMatchStatusEntCd.description: A code representing the status of front-end matching process. Sample values are Insured Front End Match, Operator or Occupant Front End Match, Policy Not Front End Matched.

frontEndMatchStatusSysCd.description: A code representing the status of front-end matching process. Sample values are Insured Front End Match, Operator or Occupant Front End Match, Policy Not Front End Matched.

frozenRenewalCnt.description: Frozen Renewal Count is the number of policy renewals that a policy will be considered to have undergone, for calculation of its renewal discount, regardless of the actual number of renewals that the policy has experienced.

gettingToKnowYouInd.description: Indicator denotes whether or not you took the Getting to know you survey.

gettingToKnowYouSurveyDt.description: The starting date when an insured is eligible to receive the About Me Discount. This discount is received when the customer fills out a "getting to know you" survey.

goodPayerDiscountInd.description: Indicator denotes whether or not the insured has the Good Payer Discount.

healthInsurancePolicyInd.description: Indicator denotes that the insured has a health insurance policy.

hhcfInexperienceDriverEntCd.description: A code for the experience level of the operator/driver of a vehicle.  The code is used for the determination of the Household Composite Factor (HHCF), which is a decimal value used for rating purposes.

hhcfInexperienceDriverSysCd.description: A code for the experience level of the operator/driver of a vehicle.  The code is used for the determination of the Household Composite Factor (HHCF), which is a decimal value used for rating purposes.

hhcfLicensedOperatorCnt.description: The total number of operators designated under an insurance contract, including all operators across multiple record policies (MRPs). This count is used for the determination of the Household Composite Factor (HHCF), which is a decimal value used for rating purposes.

hhcfVehicleCnt.description: The total number of vehicles designated under an insurance contract, including all vehicles across multiple record policies (MRPs). The count is used for the determination of the Household Composite Factor (HHCF), which is a decimal value used for rating purposes.

hhcfYoungDriverEntCd.description: A code for the age of the youngest operator/driver of a vehicle.  The code is used for the determination of the Household Composite Factor (HHCF), which is a decimal value used for rating purposes.

hhcfYoungDriverSysCd.description: A code for the age of the youngest operator/driver of a vehicle.  The code is used for the determination of the Household Composite Factor (HHCF), which is a decimal value used for rating purposes.

higherLimitsToSupportPUPInd.description: Denotes that higher limits in the vehicle policy or watercraft policy were chosen to support the PUP Policy.

highValueInd.description: High Value Indicator denotes whether the property meets high value criteria for Replacement Cost Tool (RCT).

homeownerAssocMembershipInd.description: Indicates that membership in a homeowners association has been verified.

householdVehicleCnt.description: Total number of vehicles owned by all persons in a household

iaRolloverCRSRMInd.description: Code defining an application calling Alliance for the purpose of generating a quote.  The application may be internal or external to Allstate.

iaRolloverInd.description: Miscellaneous Control Flag on the CDB. Code Values are 12 = Independent Agent Rollover Business 75 = Independent Agent Rollover New Business (Indemnity Co.)

indemnityFeeWaiverInd.description: Indemnity Fee Waiver Indicator denotes that the Indemnity Fee amount will be waived, i.e. the insured will not have to pay it.

inexperiencedOperatorFactor.description:
Inexperienced Operator Deviation Factor will be applied to the policy using the following rules:
­    There must be at least one inexperienced operator listed as a rateable driver on the policy.
An inexperienced operator is defined as an operator that has less than 3 years of driving experience

initialLapseDt.description: The initial lapse reinstatement date that was found querying the billing database. It will be used when determining the initial tier into strategic risk management (SRM). It will not be changed unless a flat endorsement to the initial SRM policy effective date is entered from the support center and changes/removes this date and re-tier.

initialPriorCarrierNAICEntCd.description: Insurance Company Name is the name of a company that sells insurance.

initialPriorCarrierNAICSysCd.description: Insurance Company Name is the name of a company that sells insurance.

inspectionPendingInd.description: Denotes that a vehicle inspection is pending.

insuranceProgramQualificationEntCd.description: Code determines if you meet all of the qualifications for your policy to be on Massachusetts Automobile Insurance Plan (MAIP) rate plan.

insuranceProgramQualificationSysCd.description: Code determines if you meet all of the qualifications for your policy to be on Massachusetts Automobile Insurance Plan (MAIP) rate plan.

insuranceProgramRatesVerifiedEntCd.description: After rate comparison between Allstate and Massachusetts Automobile Insurance Plan (MAIP), the CES will turn on a flag to signify if the policy can be issued.  (Allstate will not issue MA Auto new business with minimum limits above the allowed MAIP premium.  All new business with minimum limits will kick off a profile at point of sale.)

insuranceProgramRatesVerifiedSysCd.description: After rate comparison between Allstate and Massachusetts Automobile Insurance Plan (MAIP), the CES will turn on a flag to signify if the policy can be issued.  (Allstate will not issue MA Auto new business with minimum limits above the allowed MAIP premium.  All new business with minimum limits will kick off a profile at point of sale.)

insuranceScoreCreditStatusEntCd.description: Designates the state of transmittal of an applicant’s credit report.

insuranceScoreCreditStatusSysCd.description: Designates the state of transmittal of an applicant’s credit report.

insured5YearsWithIAInd.description: Indicator denotes that a customer has had insurance with an independent agent for the past five years.

lapseIn12MonthsCnt.description: Lapse In Twelve Months Count is the number of time the policy has had a lapse in coverage in the past year.

lapsesIn6MonthsCnt.description: Lapses In 6 Months Count is the number of times a party had a lapse in prior coverages with prior insurance carriers within the last 6 months.

lastEndorsementEffDt.description: The date on which an endorsement or change to a policy becomes effective. An endorsement is a modifying provision added to an existing policy. A change could include spelling mistakes and address changes.

lastRatedDt.description: The date a policy was issued/offered to a consumer. This is also the date when a policy was rated for new business or renewal.

leadTransferSuccessfulInd.description: Denotes that an Allstate Agent has transferred a quote prospect to Answer Financial Incorporation (AFI).

legalScriptPlayStatusEntCd.description: Determines if the legal script was received or errored out.

legalScriptPlayStatusSysCd.description: Determines if the legal script was received or errored out.

lenTimeAllstateInsuranceMonthCnt.description: The number of consecutive months the customer has been with Allstate.

lenTimeContinuousNonStdInsuranceMonthCnt.description: The number of consecutive months the customer has had non standard insurance.

lenTimeContinuousPriorInsuranceMonthCnt.description: The number of consecutive months a customer has had prior insurance with another insurance company.

lenTimeContinuousStdInsuranceMonthCnt.description: The number of consecutive months a customer has had standard insurance with a company.

lenTimeCurrentAddressYearCnt.description: The number of years a customer has lived at the same residence.

lenTimeInsuredMonthCnt.description: The number of months a customer has had insurance with a company.

lenTimeInterruptionMonthCnt.description: The number of months a customer has had a lapse in coverage.

lenTimeLapseBetweenPoliciesDayCnt.description: The number of days coverage has lapsed between the time a customer has cancelled one policy and purchased another.

lenTimeNonJUAContinuousInsuranceMonthCnt.description: The number of continuous months that a party has prior insurance coverage that is not Joint Underwriting Assoc/Assigned Risk (JUA/AR), prior to Allstate.

lenTimePrevAddressMonthCnt.description: The number of months the customer has lived at a previous address.

lenTimePrevInsurerYearCnt.description: The number of years a customer has had previous insurance with another insurance company.

lenTimeWithIAYearCnt.description: The number of years a customer has been serviced by an Independent agent.

levelOfRepresentationInd.description: Indicates whether the party stated that they would allow being contacted by a producer regarding their quote or policy.

liabilityFor3YearsDriverCnt.description: The number of named insured and/or spouse operators having 3 or more years of continuous liability.

licenseRevokedInd.description: License Revoked Indicator denotes that a person's drivers license has been has been taken away.

lifeCrossSellCaseId.description: Case Identification Number is a unique number assigned to each business submission by the computer system to track the case's progress through the system.

limitsInconsistentInd.description: Limits Inconsistent Indicator denotes that coverage limits are not consistent between vehicles on the policy.

limitsInconsistentOverrideInd.description: Indicates whether the ‘Limits Inconsistency Indicator’ in the coverage tab is manually overridden by the user or not.  This will help to restrict the defaulting of the Limits Inconsistency Indicator to ‘Yes’ if the user has manually overridden the field (in case of any leased vehicle).

linePlacementCreditUsedInd.description: Indicator denotes that credit was ordered and reviewed to determine line placement.

linePlacementOverrideInd.description: Indicator designates that the line code that was determined by the system has been overriden.

linePlacementOverrideReasonEntCd.description: Codes detail why the line placement was overriden during the quote.

linePlacementOverrideReasonSysCd.description: Codes detail why the line placement was overriden during the quote.

linePlacementPriorInsuranceInd.description: Indicator denotes that the line code placement was determined using prior insurnace.

linePlacementRejectedInd.description: Indicator designates that a line code rejection has taken place.

linePlacementRejectReasonText.description: Designates the reason a line code rejection has taken place.

lobEntCd.description: A code identifying the line of business classification. This element uses the LineOfBusiness code list.

lobSysCd.description: A code identifying the line of business classification. This element uses the LineOfBusiness code list.

lobSubEntCd.description: A code identifying the line of business subcode that further refines the line of business code. The code identifies the product classification of the policy.

lobSubSysCd.description: A code identifying the line of business subcode that further refines the line of business code. The code identifies the product classification of the policy.

logonId.description: Logon Identifier is a unique textual character string which allows a person to log into a computer system.

maxSurchargeRate.description: The ratio of policy Allstate collision and comprehensive rates including Safe Driver Insurance Plan points to the policy Bureau collision and comprehensive rates including Safe Driver Insurance Plan points.

mechanizationEntCd.description: The extent to which a policy or claim is automated. To be automated or mechanized means that it is processed on a computer system as opposed to by hand on paper. For a policy, either the accounting or the rating portion can be automated, or both.

mechanizationSysCd.description: The extent to which a policy or claim is automated. To be automated or mechanized means that it is processed on a computer system as opposed to by hand on paper. For a policy, either the accounting or the rating portion can be automated, or both.

migratedFromAIOrAICInd.description: Indicates that this policy was initially an Allstate Indemnity or Allstate Insurance Company policy.

minBIEffDt.description: The date when policy changed to a bodily injury limit equal to or greater than state selected limit. This is used to determine if the policy has maintained at least the state limit for 3/5 years and is a tier level determinant and hence a premium determinant.

minimumPremiumFactor.description: The Minimum Premium Factor is a factor applied when the Esurance Deviation Factor is below the Minimum Premium Factor. The Minimum Premium Factor will be applied separately to the Liability portion of the policy and the Physical Damage portion of the policy for North Carolina state

miscellaneousControlEntCd.description: A code representing an existing condition or pertinent information about a policy

miscellaneousControlSysCd.description: A code representing an existing condition or pertinent information about a policy

motorClubMembershipInd.description: Motor Club Membership Indicator denotes that a policy has an additional Motor Club policy.

multipleRecordPolicyCollapseDt.description: This is the date the policy was collapsed to one policy with up to 10 items. Used for BDE processing.

multiPolicyDiscountQualifyingLOBEntCd.description: A code representing the policy line of business that allowed the customer to avail of the multi-policy discount.

multiPolicyDiscountQualifyingLOBSysCd.description: A code representing the policy line of business that allowed the customer to avail of the multi-policy discount.

newBusinessRateEffDt.description: New Business Rate Effective Date is the day when the rates first become applicable to new business.

nextScheduledActivityEntCd.description: A code for the next scheduled activity for the premium record. Scheduled activity is controlled by the system.

nextScheduledActivitySysCd.description: A code for the next scheduled activity for the premium record. Scheduled activity is controlled by the system.

nextScheduledActivityDt.description: The date on which the next scheduled activity for the premium record should take place. Scheduled activity is controlled by the system.

nextTermEffVehicleCnt.description: The number of items on a policy that become effective in the future.The value should not be over 1 for more than a policy period. This field is used to give a policyholder the Multi-cycle discount even if they only have 1 cycle on their policy (it assumes that they will be purchasing a new cycle shortly). This field should reset to zero at the next renewal after it was set. Example: A new policyholder insures 1 motorcycle and plans to purchase another within a month. The policy would initially have Future effective Items set to 1. When the policyholder comes up for renewal, this value is set to zero (so if the insured didn't buy a motorcycle they would not longer get the multi-cycle discount).

nextTermTermEndorsementInd.description: Indicates that at least one policy endorsement will be applied at the next policy renewal. Some endorsements are not allowed to be booked except at renewal time.

noAccidentWaiverMonthCt.description: No Accident Waiver Month Count is the number of months that the customer has not had a chargeable accident waived that have been

noChargeEndorsementEntCd.description: A code specifying whether an endorsement will or will not result in additional costs to the customer in the current term.

noChargeEndorsementSysCd.description: A code specifying whether an endorsement will or will not result in additional costs to the customer in the current term.

nonFaultAccidentLast3YearsCnt.description: Number Of Not At Fault Accidents is the total count of non chargeable losses during the last 3 years.

nonFaultAccidentLast5YearsCnt.description: Total count of non chargeable losses during the last 5 years.

nonOwnedVehicleCoverageInd.description: Denotes whether the person drives a vehicle not owned by the named insured or a resident relative, as in a company officer who drives a company car.

noPriorInsuranceReasonEntCd.description: No Need Reason Prior Insurance Description identifies why an operator does not need prior insurance information.

noPriorInsuranceReasonSysCd.description: No Need Reason Prior Insurance Description identifies why an operator does not need prior insurance information.

noPriorInsuranceReasonDesc.description: No Prior Insurance Reason identifies why an operator does not need prior insurance information.

occupationRatingLevelEntCd.description: A code representing the general industry or work performed by a person used for rating purposes.

occupationRatingLevelSysCd.description: A code representing the general industry or work performed by a person used for rating purposes.

optimizedOfferInd.description: Denotes if it is an optimized offer.

orderConsumerReportInd.description: Denotes that the party stated that they allow Allstate to order consumer report about them. This is generally specified when a party purchases a policy.

originalIndemnityInceptionDt.description: Original Indemnity Inception Date is the start date of the original indemnity policy.

originalNewBusinessDt.description: The day when a policy was originally underwritten.

originalPolicyInceptionDt.description: The original inception date of this specific policy.

outstandingBalanceAmt.description: The outstanding balance of a policy on the 'as of date' as indicated by the policy balance and the policy balance subtype.

pcCoverage.description: Insurance Policy Coverage is an insurance coverage - defined by the related product and included in the related insurance policy agrmt - with selected deductibles, and selected imits or limits determined based on the value of a related asset.

pendedTerminationReasonEntCd.description: A code that describes the status of a pending termination. Sample values are Agent Terminated, CIC NSC Terminated, System Terminated, Pending Termination Initiated, Pending Termination Voided.

pendedTerminationReasonSysCd.description: A code that describes the status of a pending termination. Sample values are Agent Terminated, CIC NSC Terminated, System Terminated, Pending Termination Initiated, Pending Termination Voided.

pendedTerminationStatusEntCd.description: A code that identifies the reason(s) why a customer chooses to waive the 5-day grace period for a pending policy termination. If the customer waives the grace period, the policy is terminated immediately. Sample Insured Irate, Insured Needs Immediate Processing Request, Other.

pendedTerminationStatusSysCd.description: A code that identifies the reason(s) why a customer chooses to waive the 5-day grace period for a pending policy termination. If the customer waives the grace period, the policy is terminated immediately. Sample Insured Irate, Insured Needs Immediate Processing Request, Other.

permanentLifePolicyInd.description: Permanent Life Policy Indicator denotes that the insured has a Life product, like term insurance.

policyAdministrationSystemEntCd.description: A code representing an existing administration system from which the Policy has originated.

policyAdministrationSystemSysCd.description: A code representing an existing administration system from which the Policy has originated.

policyClassGroupEntCd.description: Determined based on number of occupants, age of oldest occupant and number of private passenger vehicles in the household. Sample values in Alliance OM spreadsheet are "003", "184"

policyClassGroupSysCd.description: Determined based on number of occupants, age of oldest occupant and number of private passenger vehicles in the household. Sample values in Alliance OM spreadsheet are "003", "184"

policyDesc.description: Policy Description contains information about the recrational vehicle.

policyIssuedDt.description: The date on which the policy paperwork was issued. (This is typically a London market requirement.)

policyMigrationEffDt.description: The oldest date against which a backdated endorsement may be processed. This limitation is due to the migration of a policy from one computer system to another. An endorsement cannot physically be completed against the historical data on the old system.

policyNbr.description: The unique number assigned to the policy, or submission, being referenced. If required for self-insurance, the self-insured license or contract number.

policyOptionPkg.description: This aggregate contains Policy Option Package Information

policySpecialCode.description: Policy Special Type reflects certain types of existing conditions or pertinent information about a policy.

policyTermEntCd.description: A code indicating term, or length of the policy. The source of this code list is the individual insurer.

policyTermSysCd.description: A code indicating term, or length of the policy. The source of this code list is the individual insurer.

policyTerminatedEntCd.description: Termination Reason Description identifies the reason that a policy or item termination occurred.

policyTerminatedSysCd.description: Termination Reason Description identifies the reason that a policy or item termination occurred.

policyTerminatedDt.description: Policy Termination Date is the date on which a policy contract is no longer in effect. This may be prior to the expiration date (end of current term) due to an insured's request to terminate the policy. The termination date may not be after the expiration date or prior to the effective date. If a renewal has been issued, but not taken, the termination date is the effective date of the renewal period (flat termination). When the renewal is issued, the termination date is automatically bumped to the next term's termination date.

policyTerminatedSubEntCd.description: A code representing a more granular and detailed reason for termination.

policyTerminatedSubSysCd.description: A code representing a more granular and detailed reason for termination.

policyTypeEntCd.description: A code representing the associated contract for insuring property.

policyTypeSysCd.description: A code representing the associated contract for insuring property.

policyVersionNbr.description: A number or other identifier used by the company to identify 'this' version of the policy.

preferredNonBestFCRAInd.description: Preferred Non Best Fair Credit Reporting Act Indicator denotes whether the policy was rated as non best because the named insured and/or spouse has bad credit based on preferred insurance.

prevAccountingCompanyEntCd.description: Accounting Company Name is used to identify an entity for which Allstate is required to submit separate financial and/or statutory records. This could be an Allstate company or an authority outside of the Allstate Corporation.

prevAccountingCompanySysCd.description: Accounting Company Name is used to identify an entity for which Allstate is required to submit separate financial and/or statutory records. This could be an Allstate company or an authority outside of the Allstate Corporation.

prevLOBEntCd.description: The line code before the policy was migrated to a new line code.

prevLOBSysCd.description: The line code before the policy was migrated to a new line code.

prevLOBSubEntCd.description: The Line of business sub-code is used to experience rate several line and coverage combinations. For example, Auto Physical Damage, Auto Liability, GL Auto Physcial Damage and Auto Liability.

prevLOBSubSysCd.description: The Line of business sub-code is used to experience rate several line and coverage combinations. For example, Auto Physical Damage, Auto Liability, GL Auto Physcial Damage and Auto Liability.

prevSafeDrivingBonusDt.description: Safe Driving Bonus Date represents when an operator becomes eligible to receive a credit on their policy premium from not having a claim within a specified policy term.

prior3YearsStdLiabilityInd.description: Prior Three Years Standard Liability Indicator denotes that a named insured and/or spouse has had standard liability coverage for the past 3 years.

prior5YearsAllstateInsuranceInd.description: Prior 5 Years Allstate Insurance Indicator denotes that the named insured has had prior insurance for the past 5 years.

priorAllstateOriginalYear.description: The year a prior Allstate policy was initially put into effect.

priorCarrierLast5YearsCnt.description: Prior Insurance Carrier Count is the number of prior carriers with which an applicant has had insurance.

priorInsuranceCancelledInd.description: Prior Insurance Cancelled Indicator denotes that the named insured has no continuous coverage with the prior insurance policy.

priorInsuranceNoNeedInd.description: Prior Insurance No Need Indicator denotes that the named insured is not required.

priorNonStdSurchargeDropDt.description: The date the Non-Standard or No Prior Insurance Discount was dropped from the policy.

priorNonStdSurchargeInd.description: Prior Non Standard Surcharge Indicator denotes that the named insured had atypical surcharges on prior policies.

priorPayerTypeEntCd.description: A code describing the relationship between the payer and payment type.

priorPayerTypeSysCd.description: A code describing the relationship between the payer and payment type.

priorPolicy.description: elements under OtherOrPriorPolicy mapped at role level

priorPUPLimitAmt.description: The most recent PUP limit amount prior to coming to Allstate.

priorTerminationStatusEntCd.description: Termination Status identifies the status of a pending termination.

priorTerminationStatusSysCd.description: Termination Status identifies the status of a pending termination.

productEntCd.description: Product Program Type indicates the product program or combination of product programs for a policy. The product program type will contain either a single or a group of components issued at either new business or renewal.

productSysCd.description: Product Program Type indicates the product program or combination of product programs for a policy. The product program type will contain either a single or a group of components issued at either new business or renewal.

productProgramTypeEntCd.description: A code representing the product program or combination of product programs for a policy. The product program type will contain either a single or a group of components issued at either new business or renewal.  Examples where codes are assigned are 1) the situation where a particular version of the Strategic Risk Management (SRM) is the only component issued; 2) When the SRM component and Your Choice Auto (YCA) component are issued; 3) When a newer version of the SRM component is being implemented in a state/company/line combination where an older version of SRM component has been previously used. In this last example, the product program type code represents the policy as processed through a "gradual overlay" to the new SRM version component.

productProgramTypeSysCd.description: A code representing the product program or combination of product programs for a policy. The product program type will contain either a single or a group of components issued at either new business or renewal.  Examples where codes are assigned are 1) the situation where a particular version of the Strategic Risk Management (SRM) is the only component issued; 2) When the SRM component and Your Choice Auto (YCA) component are issued; 3) When a newer version of the SRM component is being implemented in a state/company/line combination where an older version of SRM component has been previously used. In this last example, the product program type code represents the policy as processed through a "gradual overlay" to the new SRM version component.

proofResidenceOwnershipInd.description: Proof Residence Ownership Indicator denotes that the named Insured and/or spouse can provide legal documentation of the dwelling ownership.

propertyInsuranceEntCd.description: A code representing the type of property insurance an individual has.

propertyInsuranceSysCd.description: A code representing the type of property insurance an individual has.

propertyInsuranceInd.description: A code that determines if policyholder has a property insurance policy in force.

propertyProgramEntCd.description: Property Program Name is the name of a new or modified product program under which a policy can be issued. The introduction of a new program is a method by which any aspect of a property insurance product may be altered, including adding new exclusions, altering the meaning of a coverage, creating a new policy type, etc. Renewal by the customer signifies acceptance of the new terms of the policy product. RAP01.PTYPGM

propertyProgramSysCd.description: Property Program Name is the name of a new or modified product program under which a policy can be issued. The introduction of a new program is a method by which any aspect of a property insurance product may be altered, including adding new exclusions, altering the meaning of a coverage, creating a new policy type, etc. Renewal by the customer signifies acceptance of the new terms of the policy product. RAP01.PTYPGM

quote.description: This aggregate is used to communicate quote information between the insurer and the agency.

rateAdjustmentInd.description: Rate Adjustment Indicator denotes that there has been an adjustment to the rate.

ratedLapseDt.description: The lapse reinstatement date used when the policy was last renewed or from a cancel/rewrite. This will be used to identify how and why the strategic risk management tier was calculated at the last renewal or cancel/rewrite when it was rated.

ratedPostalCode.description: Rated Postal Code is the postal code used for the insurance rating.

rateEffDt.description: This is the effective date of the rate.

rateMitigationFactor.description: A factor calculated at each renewal based on a comparison of old and new premiums. This factor is then required for all subsequent rate calculations during the upcoming policy period. Without this factor we cannot apply premium capping to endorsements or any other subsequent transactions. RMF is the way to rate policies on a more individual basis rather than a rate change which applies to all policies in a state/line/company.

rateMitigationInitialRenewalFactor.description: The state-selected value used in calculating the capped premium for the initial renewal for a rate control with capping.

rateMitigationSubsequentRenewalFactor.description: The state-selected value used in calculating the capped premium for the subsequent enewal for a rate control with capping.

rateTransitionFactor.description: A factor calculated at each renewal based on a comparison of old and new premiums. This factor is then required for all subsequent rate calculations during the upcoming policy period. Without this factor we cannot apply premium capping to endorsements or any other subsequent transactions. At each renewal, the RTF factor will get closer to and eventually get to 1.000 so that there is no RTF capping on the policy.

realTimePolicyNbr.description: Real Time Policy Number is when the Billing Sytem Creates the policy number during the quote to bind process.

referralDiscountInd.description: Referral Discount Indicator denotes if a discount was applied based on a referral.

rejectionReasonCCDBInd.description: Rejection Reason Current Carrier Database identifies why a contractual agreement has been terminated, cancelled or declined for a new business quote, endorsement or policy renewal.

rejectionReasonCRInd.description: Rejection Reason Credit Report identifies why a contractual agreement has been terminated, cancelled or declined for a new business quote, endorsement or policy renewal.

rejectionReasonLISInd.description: Rejection Reason Loss Information Summary identifies why a contractual agreement has been terminated, cancelled or declined for a new business quote, endorsement or policy renewal.

rejectionReasonMVRInd.description: Rejection Reason Motor Vehicle Report identifies why a contractual agreement has been terminated, cancelled or declined for a new business quote, endorsement or policy renewal.

renewalCnt.description: A restricted key figure determined by limiting, generally, net policy counts by the renewal indicator.

renewalCycleEntCd.description: A code representing a point in the renewal schedule leading up to renewal issuance.

renewalCycleSysCd.description: A code representing a point in the renewal schedule leading up to renewal issuance.

rentersSavingsAmt.description: Renters Saving Amount is the total reduction in policy premium resulting from a change in the policy.

rescindInd.description: Rescinded indicator denotes that the insurance coverage has been rescinded.

residenceOwnedRentedEntCd.description: A code indicating the household ownership status of the insured/applicant. This element uses the Ownership code list.

residenceOwnedRentedSysCd.description: A code indicating the household ownership status of the insured/applicant. This element uses the Ownership code list.

residenceTypeEntCd.description:
Residence Type is a description of a dwelling based on the number of families living in the residence, the number of residential units in a structure and the type of ownership held by the residents.
 Sample values are Single Family, Duplex, Triplex, Quadplex.

residenceTypeSysCd.description:
Residence Type is a description of a dwelling based on the number of families living in the residence, the number of residential units in a structure and the type of ownership held by the residents.
 Sample values are Single Family, Duplex, Triplex, Quadplex.

residentRelativeCnt.description: Resident Relative Count is the total number of adults and children who are resident relatives in a household.

rideForHireProgramInd.description: indicates that any vehicle on this policy is participating in a Ride for Hire program.

safeDriverTierRenewalCnt.description:
All policies will be assigned to Safe Driving Rating Tier 1 at new business.  Safe Driving Rating tier will be re-evaluated at each annual renewal.  


The Safe Driving Rating Tier will increase by 1 at each annual renewal if there are no Allstate claims on the policy with an incident date within the 12 months.

safeDrivingBonusDt.description: The starting date when an operator is eligible to receive the safe driver discount.

sameLOBInd.description: Same Line of Business Indicator is set to yes if a customer has existing policies which is the same line of business as the current transaction.

sboPolicyTermEffDt.description: Policy Effective Date is the date on which a policy term becomes effective. This may coincide with the anniversary or short term effective dates.

securityPlusDiscountEligibilityInd.description: Security Plus Discount Eligibility indicates if the participant is eligible for a Security Plus discount which is part of SRM Advanced (Lite) or some SRM functionality.

sendNextTermEffDateRerateLtrInd.description: Send Future Effective Date Rerate Letter Indicator denotes that a communication is sent to the insured concerning a rerate of the policy.

sendPolicyToProducerInd.description: Send Policy to Producer Indicator denotes if the policy should be sent to the producer.

sevenYearCleanPolicyInd.description: Clean Policy Indicator indicates whether an Allstate policy is for at least 7 years and has been clean (accident / claim free) for 7 years.

shortRateEntCd.description: Short Rate Code pertains to Billing Short Rate.

shortRateSysCd.description: Short Rate Code pertains to Billing Short Rate.

signedDtTime.description: Indicates the date the form was signed.

signedUTC.description: Signed Date And Time is the date and tIme on which the applicant signed or verbalized that they approved the application.

specialCharges.description: Special Charge Information contains details about a Special Charge.

specialReviewHandlingCode.description: Describes the area or process responsible for reviewing an insurance policy prior to renewal. The type of review may be temporary or permanent.

specificTerminationReasonEntCd.description: A code that identifies the reason that a policy or item termination occurred. This field is used to hold the values for Specific Termination Reason field which appears on the endorsement termination screen.

specificTerminationReasonSysCd.description: A code that identifies the reason that a policy or item termination occurred. This field is used to hold the values for Specific Termination Reason field which appears on the endorsement termination screen.

srmEntCd.description: Strategic Risk Management (SRM) Program Type represents the phase of SRM which the policy is written under.

srmSysCd.description: Strategic Risk Management (SRM) Program Type represents the phase of SRM which the policy is written under.

srmPhaseNbr.description: A number descirbing the phase of Strategic Risk Management (SRM).

srmProgramDt.description: The conversion date on which a policy is now rated under the Strategic Risk Management (SRM) rules. This date will be the renewal date for existing policies for a primary residence and will be either the new business date or effective date of a policy for a secondary residence.

statisticalStateEntCd.description: A code used for accounting statistical gathering purposes. Typically it is a geographic subdivision of a state to which a policy is assigned.

statisticalStateSysCd.description: A code used for accounting statistical gathering purposes. Typically it is a geographic subdivision of a state to which a policy is assigned.

strategicRiskTierEntCd.description: Tier Name is the name of a rating factor (which gets equated to a percent) for a policy or vehicle. For auto policies, it is based on driving record and driving experience in order to discount good drivers or surcharge policies for risks that were previously not actively written. For property policies, it is based on various aspects of the property such as the property age, for example. The criteria to determine the appropriate tier are state and product line specific.

strategicRiskTierSysCd.description: Tier Name is the name of a rating factor (which gets equated to a percent) for a policy or vehicle. For auto policies, it is based on driving record and driving experience in order to discount good drivers or surcharge policies for risks that were previously not actively written. For property policies, it is based on various aspects of the property such as the property age, for example. The criteria to determine the appropriate tier are state and product line specific.

systemControlEntCd.description: A codes that represents certain types of existing conditions or pertinent information about a policy.

systemControlSysCd.description: A codes that represents certain types of existing conditions or pertinent information about a policy.

tierAdjustmentGroupEntCd.description: A code representing the three additional qualifiers which make up New Jersey's tier structure.

tierAdjustmentGroupSysCd.description: A code representing the three additional qualifiers which make up New Jersey's tier structure.

tierAdjustmentGroupLockDt.description: Tthe last day of the time frame when a policy is restricted from being both re-evaluated and re-assigned to another tier adjustment group.

tierEntCd.description: The name of a rating factor (which gets equated to a percent) for a policy or vehicle. For auto policies, it is based on driving record and driving experience in order to discount good drivers or surcharge policies for risks that were previously not actively written. For property policies, it is based on various aspects of the property such as the property age, for example. The criteria to determine the appropriate tier are state and product line specific.

For auto policies, it is based on driving record and driving experience in order to discount good drivers or surcharge policies for risks that were previously not actively written. For property policies, it is based on various aspects of the property such as the property age, for example. The criteria to determine the appropriate tier are state and product line specific.

tierIncreaseCnt.description: Indicates the count of the person tier increase due to years with prior carrier (YPC).

underchargeRatePerMileInd.description: Indicates policy is under Corrective Action for undercharging rate per mile

underwritingReferralEntCd.description: A code representing the type of recommendation for review prompted by a policy endorsement.

underwritingReferralSysCd.description: A code representing the type of recommendation for review prompted by a policy endorsement.

underwritingReferralInd.description: Indicates whether or not an underwriter referral code has been placed on the policy. If so, it will be referred to an underwriter prior to the renewal offering.

underwritingReferralRevisionYear.description: Underwriting Referral Revision Year is set when processing a property policy customer move transaction.

uninsuredMotoristEconomicOptionInd.description: should this not be under OptionCd?

urbanZoneAssignedRiskPolicyInd.description: Urban Zone Assigned Risk Policy Indicator denotes that an auto or watercraft policy is determined to be a high-risk policy due to the location.

vehiclePolicy_Vehicle.description: Vehicle Policy Vehicle Information is a collection of data describing the vehicles insured on the policy.

vendorHomeOwnershipInd.description: Vendor Home Ownership Indicator denotes an ownership description for the household.

verifiedRenewalCnt.description: Number of Verifiable Renewals is used for applying the non-verifiable surcharge in applicable states. It is populated and updated by the National Support Center based on the letter of experience that they receive.

violation.description: An aggregate containing information related to the violations that were reported on a Motor Vehicle Report but extracted and condensed based on business rules.

writtenOrEffDateRateEntCd.description: Policy Written Or Effective Date Rate Type identifies whether the policy rate was calculated from the date the policy was written or the date the policy became effective.

writtenOrEffDateRateSysCd.description: Policy Written Or Effective Date Rate Type identifies whether the policy rate was calculated from the date the policy was written or the date the policy became effective.

yearsWithPriorHomeownersCarrierGroupEntC.description: Defined as the maximum total number of years immediately preceding the inception of the Allstate House and Home policy in which either the named insured or spouse has held continuous property insurance with that carrier.

yearsWithPriorHomeownersCarrierGroupSysC.description: Defined as the maximum total number of years immediately preceding the inception of the Allstate House and Home policy in which either the named insured or spouse has held continuous property insurance with that carrier.

zipCodeFlexGroupEntCd.description: Determined based on characteristics of the Allstate House and Home policy (i.e. age of home, square footage, age of oldest residence, zip code, existence of a supporting Auto policy).

zipCodeFlexGroupSysCd.description: Determined based on characteristics of the Allstate House and Home policy (i.e. age of home, square footage, age of oldest residence, zip code, existence of a supporting Auto policy).

agreement_Form.description: Agrmt Form, aka Policy Trailing Document, is a request for, and when received, a document that completes or supports information on the quote or application.  Forms do not usually contain machine readable fields but rather are just  pictures, images of documents and electronically signed documents.  Forms may be legally mandated; administratively required for binding; or requested to support the application of discounts or the removal of normally applied surcharges.  Forms may be required or requested at the point of issuing new businss; renewal or endoresment.  The form is usually requested to be returned by either the customer/patron or their producer. This is not expected to be stored as a part of the agrmt document but must reference the underlying agrmt and be joinable with the agrmt document.

agreement_PredictiveModel.description: Agreement Predictive Model Information is a collection of data that describes the Predictive Model for an agreement.

agreementParticipant.description: Agrmt Participant is a party to the agrmt that pays for, consumes, or could benefit from the agrmt; or represents one or more of those parties.  An agrmt participant can have multiple roles which require the collection of different information. Data collected for an agrmt party will be the union of data needed across all roles the party plays within the agrmt.  For example, primary named insured (PNI), additional named insured (spouse, driver/operator) occupant, beneficiary/lienholder, owner/payer, subscriber, informed party, excluded operator.

associatedMembership.description: Associated Membership Information is a collection of data concerning the insured associated memberships.

businessActivity.description: Agrmt Business Activity is an activity which lead to changes in and creation of a new version of an agrmt.  For example, renewal, add operator, drop operator, add/drop vehicle, add/drop coverage, change limit(s) or deductible(s). This is not expected to be stored as a part of the agrmt document but must reference the underlying agrmt and be joinable with the agrmt document.

currencyEntCd.description: Currency Name is the monetary denomination used and accepted as legal tender for commerce within a country. In most cases, a country will have only one currency, but it is possible for a country's currency to change over time.

currencySysCd.description: Currency Name is the monetary denomination used and accepted as legal tender for commerce within a country. In most cases, a country will have only one currency, but it is possible for a country's currency to change over time.

languageEntCd.description: A code indicating the language in which the actual policy is to be worded. This element uses the International Standards Organization 639 code list.

languageSysCd.description: A code indicating the language in which the actual policy is to be worded. This element uses the International Standards Organization 639 code list.

otherPolicy.description: Other Policy Information is a collection of data concerning other policies that are owned by the insured.

prospectPriorityEntCd.description: Prospect Priority specifies whether follow-up activity should be pursued in a timely manner.

prospectPrioritySysCd.description: Prospect Priority specifies whether follow-up activity should be pursued in a timely manner.

prospectSourceEntCd.description: Prospect Source specifies the source of the prospect.

prospectSourceSysCd.description: Prospect Source specifies the source of the prospect.

prospectSourceDesc.description: Prospect Source Description contains information about a potential customer.

serviceProvider.description: A party who provides a service such as inspectors, appraisal specialists, drone operators.

transaction.description: Transaction Type describes an action or operation that is carried out within the organization to a policy, claim, or any other agreement with a customer.

underwritingDecision.description: The short descriptive text that characterizes the approval decision made by the underwriter in regards to the insureds on the policy. Ex. 1 - Policy approved with the underwriting class that the policy was applied for at 2 - Policy approved but at a different underwriting class than applied 3 - not approved

vehiclePolicy.description: Vehicle Policy Type contains the details on the policy for the insured vehicle.
